title: Flipped Learning-Based Core Competency Enhancement Program for Pharmaceutical Therapeutics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical terminology and understanding of human physiology
context.additional_context: Program for managers/leaders in corporate new drug development teams, establishing self-directed learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply major gastrointestinal disorder drug therapy protocols with over 85% accuracy
Learners can present patient-tailored drug interaction management strategies in at least three clinical scenarios
Learners can create treatment plans according to a 5-level evaluation criteria in team-based projects and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
